settings.title: Watch and Wait
settings.description: Your prostate remains whole. You might be undergoing close monitoring for prostate cancer. You were told that you don’t have a high risk of prostate cancer and don’t need treatment right now.

settings.title: Post Treatment
settings.description: Your prostate has undergone treatment such radiation therapy (External Beam Radiation Therapy or Brachytherapy), High Intensity Focused Ultrasound (HIFU), or surgery.

settings.title: Post Treatment - Advanced
settings.description: You might have had a recurrence of prostate cancer or were told that you now have an increased risk of prostate cancer. You may be receiving proactive Androgen Deprivation Therapy (ADT).

settings.heading: Prostate Support for Every Stage of Survival
settings.subheading: Which stage best describes your survivorship journey?
